statements: SELECT * FROM ProductPerformanceMetrics
SELECT product_id, product_name, revenue FROM ProductPerformanceMetrics ORDER BY revenue DESC
SELECT product_name, units_sold FROM ProductPerformanceMetrics WHERE units_sold > 50
SELECT product_id, product_name, performance_rating FROM ProductPerformanceMetrics ORDER BY performance_rating ASC
SELECT product_name, revenue FROM ProductPerformanceMetrics WHERE revenue < 1000
SELECT product_name, revenue FROM ProductPerformanceMetrics WHERE units_sold > 100 ORDER BY revenue DESC
SELECT product_name, units_sold, performance_rating FROM ProductPerformanceMetrics WHERE performance_rating >= 4 AND revenue < 5000
SELECT product_id, product_name, units_sold, revenue FROM ProductPerformanceMetrics WHERE revenue BETWEEN 3000 AND 6000 ORDER BY units_sold ASC
SELECT * FROM ProductPerformanceMetrics WHERE performance_rating = 5
SELECT product_name, performance_rating FROM ProductPerformanceMetrics WHERE units_sold < 50 ORDER BY performance_rating DESC
SELECT product_id, product_name, sales_volume, revenue FROM product_performance_metrics WHERE sales_volume > 1000
SELECT * FROM product_performance_metrics WHERE revenue < 5000
SELECT product_name, sales_volume FROM product_performance_metrics ORDER BY sales_volume DESC
SELECT * FROM slow-moving_items ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT item_id, item_name, days_on_shelf FROM slow-moving_items WHERE days_on_shelf > 30
SELECT product_name, revenue FROM product_performance_metrics ORDER BY revenue DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM slow-moving_items WHERE days_on_shelf > 30 ORDER BY days_on_shelf ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, sales_volume FROM product_performance_metrics WHERE revenue > 1000 ORDER BY sales_volume DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT item_name, price FROM slow-moving_items WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY price ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, sales_volume, revenue FROM product_performance_metrics WHERE sales_volume > 500 ORDER BY revenue DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics;
SELECT product_name, sales_performance FROM performance_metrics WHERE sales_performance > 1000;
SELECT product_name, sales_performance, promotion_status FROM performance_metrics WHERE promotion_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM promotion_items WHERE promotion_category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY promotion_discount DESC;
SELECT item_name, clearance_date FROM clearance_items WHERE clearance_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY clearance_date ASC;
SELECT id, product_name, sales_performance, promotion_status FROM performance_metrics;
SELECT item_id, item_name, promotion_category, promotion_discount FROM promotion_items ORDER BY promotion_discount DESC;
SELECT clearance_id, item_id, item_name, clearance_date FROM clearance_items WHERE clearance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT item_id, item_name, promotion_start_date, promotion_end_date FROM promotion_items WHERE promotion_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT id, product_name, sales_performance, promotion_status FROM performance_metrics WHERE sales_performance > 5000 ORDER BY sales_performance DESC;
SELECT * FROM product_performance_metrics WHERE sales_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, sales_amount FROM product_performance_metrics WHERE promotion_status = true;
SELECT product_name, sales_amount FROM product_performance_metrics ORDER BY sales_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM promotions WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT clearance_type, start_date, end_date FROM clearances WHERE clearance_type LIKE '%sale%';

SELECT product_id, product_name, sales_amount FROM product_performance_metrics WHERE sales_amount > 10000;
SELECT item_name, sales_amount FROM slow_moving_items ORDER BY sales_amount DESC;
SELECT promotion_type, start_date, end_date FROM promotions WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT product_name, sales_amount, promotion_status FROM product_performance_metrics JOIN clearances ON product_performance_metrics.product_id = clearances.clearance_id;
SELECT * FROM product_performance_metrics;
SELECT product_id, product_name, performance_score FROM product_performance_metrics ORDER BY performance_score DESC;
SELECT promo_name, discount_percentage FROM promotions WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT item_name, units_sold FROM slowmoving_items WHERE last_sold_date <= '2022-04-30';

SELECT promo_name, start_date, end_date FROM promotions WHERE end_date > '2023-01-01';
